name: Serious Salads: Chickpeas, Corn and Red Peppers with Honey-Lime Vinaigrette
description: Fall's just around the corner. How about a last hurrah summer salad? This one features fresh sweet corn, crisp red bell peppers and buttery-textured chickpeas in a honey-lime vinaigrette scented with cumin.
recipeIngredient: 2 ears cooked corn, kernels scraped from the cob
3 scallions, white and green parts, finely sliced
1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, best quality (recommended: Lucini)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and toss well. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until ready to serve.
